# HyprBrowser Assets

This directory contains assets for HyprBrowser.

## Files

- **font.ttf** - Claude Garamond font (add your own or use system font)
- **icon.ico** - Window title bar icon (Windows)
- **icon.png** - Application icon

## Adding Custom Assets

1. Place `.ttf` font files here for custom typefaces
2. Add `.ico` files for window icons
3. Add `.png` files for application icons
4. Assets are automatically copied to `dist/assets/` during build
